BBEX3.A.HTG.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in Haiti * / EUR 1 = HTG ...
Source: Banque de la Republique d`Haiti, Port-au-Prince.

Methodology: * We do not have any data from Haiti on euro exchange rates; the comparable rates were calculated on the basis of month-end exchange rates for the US dollar in Haiti in conjunction with the respective euro reference exchange rate of the European Central Bank for the US dollar.
